page.title: 16Music Festival at Morecambe.
page.content: Each year The Regional Music School organise a day of music at the College of Further Education on Morecambe Road. All children who attend music lessons in this area will be at one music making day. The children will learn music throughout the day and in the evening will perform a concert also at the college. This day is an important part of the childrens music career. The date the concert took place this year was Wednesday 3rd of July. All the children were split up into either Brass Bands, Orchestras, Wind Bands or Ensembles. It was very successful. We played a different assortment of music on this day with the music teachers and children enjoying the day and a great deal of effort being put in. The day and concert were enjoyed by parents, teachers and the children.
